This shirt looks as pictured and the color was correct. It's a nice soft material and seemed good on the sizing. This is just a super cute shirt, can be casual or dressed up.

At first I thought this long sleeve shirt by ANRABESS was adorable and was looking forward to its arrival.  Once it arrived I machine washed the shirt and dried it on a drying rack, unfortunately the pleats do not stay down.  I ordered a medium and fluctuate between a size 8 or 10 depending on what I am ordering, but mainly a size 8.  The shirt was comfortable, but the pleats looked odd and I don’t know how much I will wear the shirt, especially if I need to iron down the pleats after I wash the shirt. Which is a bummer since I really liked the gathered, ruffled sleeves.

This shirt might not be the best fit for you if you’re petite. The arms are a bit too long. I’m trying to be positive, but it does give off a cheap vibe. The fabric is a bit thin, but the shirt seems well-made. However, I’m not a fan of the pattern on the chest.

评论概述: A Review of the ANRABESS Tunic Top
评论详情: I recently bought this long sleeve tunic top from ANRABESS, and I'm so glad I did! The pleated design adds a touch of texture and interest, while the crewneck is a classic and flattering style.  The fabric is soft and comfortable, making it perfect for fall. It's also well-made and seems to be holding up well. I've worn it with jeans, leggings, and even skirts, and it looks great with everything.  I've received so many compliments on this top, and I'm definitely going to get a lot of use out of it. If you're looking for a trendy and versatile top to add to your wardrobe, I highly recommend this one from ANRABESS.

I ordered this top in a size Medium in pink.  The medium fits my size medium (8/10) body comfortably.  I am glad it is true to size! My bust and waist fall between size medium and large but in past clothes from this brand, medium has been my best fit me. The material is very comfortable and has a nice drape. It is lightweight but not clingy.  Pink color is close to the advertising photos--a little more vibrant. Pleased!

评论概述: Great Looking and Fitting Casual or Dressy Top
评论详情: I ordered the Anrabess Long Sleeve Fall Shirt in Army Green and size XL and it is exactly as pictured.  The sizing is true to size for me;  I ordered my regular size and it fit me perfectly.  The sleeves are puffed style and long;  it has a crew neckline with gathered pleats;  is a soft, comfortable blend of polyester, elastane and rayon so there is some stretch to this blouse.  Lastly, with the feel of this blouse, I will use my steamer rather than an iron when it is needed.  I love this blouse and easily rate it a 5 out of 5.
